instructions.name: admin_force_cancel_listing
docs: Admin-only escape hatch to repair/cancel corrupted listings.
Returns NFT to seller and marks listing + card_record accordingly.

instructions.name: admin_force_close_v2
docs: Admin-only hard reset for V2 sessions; frees any passed Rare+ CardRecords.

instructions.name: claim_pack_batch
docs: New: claim selected cards in smaller batches to reduce heap/CU pressure.

instructions.name: claim_pack_batch3
docs: Test helper: claim exactly 3 cards in one ix (for benchmarking); minimal logging.

instructions.name: claim_pack_v2
docs: Tx2 Keep path – transfers only the Rare+ assets listed in the PackSessionV2.

instructions.name: expire_session_v2
docs: Post-window cleanup – frees Rare+ reservations without payout.

instructions.name: finalize_claim
docs: New: finalize after all cards are user-owned; sets state = Accepted.
remaining_accounts should include all card_record PDAs for verification.

instructions.name: open_pack
docs: New lightweight open: only Rare+ CardRecords are reserved on-chain (max 3).

accounts.name: vault_treasury
docs: Treasury to receive SOL fees (typically same as vault_authority PDA)

instructions.name: sellback_pack_v2
docs: Tx2 Sellback path – frees Rare+ reservations and pays the refund.

errors.name: CardTooCommon
errors.msg: Card rarity must be Rare or above
